Question: In 1971, Dodd, Mead reprinted it when this person was seen as an anti-establishment figure.
Hints: Upon discovering the prank, this person was heard to yell, "Who put pineapple juice in my pineapple juice?".
The session was arranged by Paul's old Army pal Bill Morrow, a friend he had in common with this person.
The anecdote that this person often remarked, "Philadelphia, wonderful town, spent a week there one night" is unsubstantiated.
